class.name: Attribute
class.brief_description: An attribute that can be added to an AttributeSet.
class.description: An attribute that can be added to an AttributeSet.

method.name: create
method.description: Creates a new Attribute with the given values.

members.member: The initial value of the attribute.
The maximum value of the attribute. If the value is set to 0, the attribute will have no maximum value.
The minimum value of the attribute.
